# pointOfInterestFilter

**Instance Property**

The filter the framework uses to determine the points of interest to show on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var pointOfInterestFilter: MKPointOfInterestFilter? { get set }
```

## Controlling what the map displays

- **showsTraffic**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the maps shows traffic conditions.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the maps shows traffic conditions.
